p: In this study, the apoptotic potential for pyridazines 11l and 11m, the most potent anti-proliferative agents herein reported, has been assessed in both breast cancer T-47D and MDA-MB-231 cell lines using Annexin V FITC/PI dual staining assay. Both T-47D and MDA-MB-231 cells were treated with pyridazines 11l and 11m at their IC 50s for 48 h. The obtained results have been depicted in Figures 4–6.
